meanings.definition: A traditional Scandinavian dish made from dried whitefish that has been soaked in lye.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother served delicious lutfisk during the holiday season.
meanings.sent2: In Sweden, lutfisk is a popular dish for Christmas dinners.
meanings.sent3: The lutfisk looked like a piece of jellyfish on my plate!
meanings.sent4: The lutfisk on the table resembled a ghostly apparition.
meanings.sent5: The smell of lutfisk lingered in the air, reminding me of childhood holidays.

meanings.definition: To prepare or cook lutfisk in the traditional manner.
meanings.sent1: I will lutfisk the fish for our family gathering.
meanings.sent2: She lutfisks the whitefish with care and precision.
meanings.sent3: When he tried to lutfisk the dish, it turned into a culinary disaster!
meanings.sent4: She lutfisked the meal to perfection, impressing everyone at the dinner party.
meanings.sent5: The chef's skillful hands lutfisked the lye-soaked fish into a delectable treat.
